sense.def:
A vault
je zavarovan prostor, v katerem lahko varno hranimo denar in druge dragocenosti.

seg.quote: The money was deposited in the vaults of a firm of solicitors.

sense.def:
The vault of a church or cemetery
je prostor v cerkvi ali na pokopališču, kjer so pokopani umrli.

A vault
je tudi obokana streha ali strop.

To vault something
ali
to vault over it
pomeni skočiti čez nekaj tako, da se ob tisto opremo z eno ali obema rokama.

seg.quote: They vaulted effortlessly over the wall.
